item.title: Acoustic Guitar - Cool Grayscale Guitarist Design
item.description: A cool design for guitarists who not only love to play their favorite instrument but also want to show it on a t-shirt, hoodie or other product. A great idea for a birthday or Christmas gift. / The design consists of a clipped acoustic guitar showing part of the corpus and neck in different shades of gray. Keep on strumming! • Millions of unique designs by independent artists. Find your thing.

item.title: Choose Your Axe The Weapon of Guitarists - Black Design
item.description: Heavy metal and hard rock musicians love them, guitars that look like axes. Like the ones you see on this design that asks to choose your axe. / Is music your weapon of choice and do you love to rock out heavy on your axe? Then this is the right design to get on a t-shirt, hoodie or other product. It also makes for a rocking birthday or Christmas gift for guitar players. • Also buy this artwork on apparel, stickers, phone cases, and more.
